Entries.307010200/t 1400 1800/n AbigailForestCam: continue/77 40/farmer 87 40 3 Abigail 76 40 1/skippable/pause 500/message "So, you and Abigail arrived in the Forest. Entries.307010200/t 1400 1800/n AbigailForestCam: continue/77 40/farmer 78 40 3 Abigail 76 40 1/skippable/pause 1000/message "So, you and Abigail arrived in the Forest. There are a lot of snow around, so it will be hard to find a place to set up picnic. The weather is pretty cold."/question fork1 "So, what should I do?# Let’s set it up.#That’s better to go home (end event)."/fork AbigailDateEnd /pause 500/speak Abigail "What? Are you seriously want to set on snow and make a picnic at this weather? No, way, I’m going home!"/message "Picnic in the winter forest. That’s sound better then that is."/friendship Abigail -100/friendship AbigailLewd -100/end warpOut
